13/12/2022
You submitted the data management information that is asked for in the proposal. At this stage of the project FWO asks a more elaborate data management plan. To write this you can use DMPonline, selecting the FWO template, here you can also find guidance. Alternatively, you can use the word template that you can find on the FWO website (www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/). You can find more information on the FWO DMP requirements our RDM website: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp.
